app.title: Simple Mortgage Calculator
app.description: A React-based mortgage calculator application that allows users to manage banks and calculate mortgage payments.

banks.title: Banks Management
banks.noBanks: No banks found. Add your first bank to get started.
banks.clickHint: üí° Click on any bank row to view detailed information
banks.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this bank?

validation.bankNameCapital: Bank name must start with a capital letter
validation.maxLoanPositive: Maximum loan must be a positive number
validation.minDownPaymentPositive: Minimum down payment must be a positive number
validation.loanTermPositive: Loan term must be a positive number
validation.interestRatePositive: Interest rate must be a positive number
validation.addFailed: Failed to add bank. Please try again.

validation.downPaymentTooHigh: Down payment cannot exceed loan amount
validation.loanAmountTooHigh: Loan amount exceeds maximum loan for selected bank
validation.downPaymentTooLow: Down payment is below minimum required for selected bank

warnings.highDownPayment: Consider a lower down payment to keep more cash available
warnings.lowDownPayment: Higher down payment reduces monthly payments and total interest

patterns.title: React Patterns Demo
patterns.description: This page demonstrates various React patterns for code reusability and maintainability.

errorBoundary.title: üõ°Ô∏è ErrorBoundary Demo
errorBoundary.description: ErrorBoundary catches JavaScript errors anywhere in the child component tree.

portal.title: üö™ Portal Demo
portal.description: Portals render content outside the normal DOM hierarchy.
portal.modalDescription: This modal is rendered using React Portal, which renders content outside the normal DOM hierarchy.

hoc.title: üîÑ Higher-Order Component Demo
hoc.description: HOCs wrap components with additional functionality.
hoc.protectedDescription: This content is only visible when authenticated

renderProps.description: Render props pattern shares behavior through a prop that receives a function.

memoization.title: ‚ö° Memoization Demo
memoization.description: Memoization prevents unnecessary re-renders and optimizes expensive calculations.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.
